issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Complete TPC-H Benchmark Queries
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10820](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10820). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add the rest of the TPC-H queries so they can be easily executed as more SQL functionality is implemented.
